product_desc:
I am working with people who have conducted numerous successful trades along the years. It covers in forex, currency and instrument monetization markets. 
We have counterparts set in European top banks able to receive instruments to fund currency trade that's historically performed around 12% minimum per average calendar month. Performance is not designated nor guaranteed upon the understanding the nature of the trade. A clear performance sheet can be provided upon your submission of your file. 

If cash fund we can set your own trade account which will be under your own name. A trading entity will be nominated to you as counterpart to engage for 90days minimum trading period. During trading such fund is blocked. When he/she no longer wishes to continue the trade a written 30days in advance notice shall be given to their counterpart. The minimum cash fund to trade is USD300.000. 

One of the purposes of raising this capital is for further angel investing.
high_concept: capital raising for social and private entrpreneurship
name: Mexiabiz
